body: That is true and is how it is done before. However, since this PR allows `gradWeight=NULL` the underlying THNN class needs a `kernel_size` parameter. Having a `kernel_size` is also consistent with all other THNN convolution functions.
body_html: That is true and is how it is done before. However, since this PR allows gradWeight=NULL the underlying THNN class needs a kernel_size parameter. Having a kernel_size is also consistent with all other THNN convolution functions.
